case.title: FREE ACCOMODATION CENTRAL - 49 (BLOOMSBURY)
case.text:
Tall good looking business guy in 40's seeking charming and good looking girl, in town for a few weeks who really needs some where to stay- in return for having a central London pad you will of course be very charming, be prepared to occasionally make yourself available to me although not too demanding in this respect and of course help keep place as jolly nice as it is now- simples- non smokers only !
thank you
